name: Sea You Later
description:
Guide a little ship across the sea, but beware of dangerous currents! A micro game made in 10 hours, initially for #Trijam158 but it took wayyy too much time. The theme was "force of Nature".

Play with your mouse

  • The ship follow your mouse. In a current, keep your mouse close to the ship, opposite to the current's direction.
  • Click to restart from the beginning

Made by

  • Géraud Zucchini (game)
  • Antoine Druaux (music)
